lead_paragraph: If Leicester City win the Premier League this season it will be the greatest upset since Ipswich Town were champions in 1962, according to Ray Crawford whose goals helped the latter side win their only top flight English title.

headline.print_headline: Leicester Success Would Be Greatest Since Ipswich, Says Crawford
headline.main: Leicester Success Would Be Greatest Since Ipswich, Says Crawford

snippet: If Leicester City win the Premier League this season it will be the greatest upset since Ipswich Town were champions in 1962, according to Ray Crawford whose goals helped the latter side win their only top flight English title....
